subject: Re: A quesion about research and investigations
author: kolrone
full_text:
Have you tried going to local newspaper or  news station websites? I think that'd be the best bet, at least before you get there. If it happened in the 70's though, I don't know if much will come up, unless there is an archive section.

-Aaron


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Chad" <cawiggins78@...> wrote:
>
> I am going to Gatlinburg, TN. While there I will be doing an
> investigation at a hotel. I was wondering where would be the best
> place to research two murders that occurred at the hotle. Should I
> start at the police department? I have searched the internet, but
> found no details.
> 
> Thanks in advance.
>
